title: CARNAVAL Font, Fun, Carnaval Rio suggestions
content:
CARNAVAL Text. Any fun, Carnaval, Rio de Janeiro inspiring Fonts suggestions accepted

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051452im_/http:/typophile.com/files/poster,design,font,grapheine,graphic,typography-46ff87d4eff490183f710c55c499c103_h_6652.jpg)
author: robertcooper

comments.content:
Fairly close: Frankfurter by Bob Newman, Alan Meeks for Letraset [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/frankfurter/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051452/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/frankfurter/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/frankfurter/")  
RNS Baruta Black. Available for free download from Impactolaser:  
 [http://www.impactolaser.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051452/http:/www.impactolaser.com/ "http://www.impactolaser.com/")  
Somewhat similar: Beans, designed originally by Dieter Zembsch, Germany in 1973.  
Digitized independently by several fontmakers.  
Lineto: [http://lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Graphic+Fonts/BEANS/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051452/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Graphic+Fonts/BEANS/ "http://lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Graphic+Fonts/BEANS/")  
Claude Pelletier, as Haricot: [http://www.dafont.com/haricot.font?fpp=50](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051452/http:/www.dafont.com/haricot.font?fpp=50 "http://www.dafont.com/haricot.font?fpp=50")  
Phatron:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontron/phatron/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051452/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontron/phatron/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontron/phatron/")  
Don
